Package flex2.tools

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CommandLineConfiguration
    Support for command line specific configuration options, like -file-specs, -help, -include-resource-bundles, -load-config, -output, -projector, and -version.
    Compc
    Entry-point for compc, the command-line tool for compiling components.
    CompcConfiguration
    compc specific configuration.
    CompJSC  
    LicensesConfiguration
    A sub-configuration of ToolsConfiguration.
    Mxmlc
    A command line tool for compiling Flex applications.
    MxmlJSC  
    PreLink
    A flex2.compiler.PreLink implementation, which creates the FlexInit and SystemManager subclass.
    Tool
    Common base class for most flex tools.
    Tool.ArgumentBag  
    ToolsConfiguration
    Common base class for most tool specific configurations.
    VersionInfo
    A helper class for querying build number, Flex version, and library version information.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    Mxmlc.CouldNotInstantiate  
    Mxmlc.OutputMessage  
    Mxmlc.StartMessage  
    PreLink.ClassesMappedToSameRemoteAlias
    Warn users with [RemoteClass] metadata that ends up mapping more than one class to the same alias.
    PreLink.CompiledAsAComponent
    Tell the user they are making a mistake by compiling a module or application as a component.
    PreLink.CouldNotParseNumber  
    PreLink.MissingSignedLibraryDigest  
    PreLink.MissingUnsignedLibraryDigest  
    PreLink.RequiredRsls
    "Required RSLs:" message.
    PreLink.RequiredRslUrl
    Display RSL URL with no failovers.
    PreLink.RequiredRslUrlWithFailover
    Display RSL URL with one failover.
    PreLink.RequiredRslUrlWithMultipleFailovers
    Display RSL URL with more than one failovers.
    Tool.FailedToLoadLicenseFile  
    Tool.NoUpdateMessage  
    ToolsConfiguration.BadAS3ESCombination  
    ToolsConfiguration.BadESStrictCombination  
    ToolsConfiguration.DeprecatedConfigurationOption
